title.narrative: External Impact Evaluation of AgResults: Innovation in Research and Delivery

description.narrative: AgResults is a multilateral initiative seeking to enhance smallholder welfare and improve food security through the use of "pull" mechanisms. The scope of the external impact evaluation is to: 1) Design impact evaluations for 2 pilots; 2) Design, implement and analyze field surveys for 4 pilots; 3) Assist as needed in the communication of the learning agenda, impact evaluation strategy and evaluations results; and 4) Participate in steering committee meetings as and when required
